text: These incompletely developed individuals are highly vulnerable to unsuitable conditions like starvation and environmental variability , and it was early recognized that survival during these stages often regulates recruitment and adult population size ( Cowan and Shaw , 2002 , Pineda et al . , 2007 ) .

text: Recruitment theories have thus focused on the environmental modulation of larval survival , and they generally assume that while spawning occurs within relatively fixed time - frames along the year cycle , hydrographic conditions and plankton production show higher inter - annual variability .
